Mount_Vernon.SAR High School: Salanter Akiba Riverdale High School (SAR High School) is a Modern Orthodox Jewish private day school in Riverdale, New York City. It was founded in 2003 by Rabbi Naftali (Tully) Harcsztark. The school is affiliated with SAR Academy, which is also in Riverdale, Bronx, New York City and a little over half of the students attending SAR High School come from the Academy.
